publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-431 Bill Wilson: Renfrewshire Libraries Serviceâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Renfrewshire Council on winning for Scotland the Hidden Treasures Brought to Life competition, held by the British Library, for the Arbuthnott Manuscripts, a 15th century missal described as being unique, visually appealing and of historical value; recognises the diverse and comprehensive services offered by the libraries service of Renfrewshire Council, and wishes it continued success in the future.
